pesticide.PPE: Some materials that are chemical-resistant to this product are made of any waterproof materials. All mixers, loaders, applicators, and other handlers must wear: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Shoes and socks; Chemical-resistant gloves (except for applicators using ground boom equipment, pilots, and flaggers). Follow manufacturer's instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE. If no such instructions for washables exist, use detergent and hot water. Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes eye irritation. Harmful if swallowed. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 - 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling poison control center, doctor or going for treatment. For emergency information concerning this product, call toll free 1-888-478-0798.
